data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Marne, Grand Est, France. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Marne, Grand Est, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Marne be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 49 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Marne, Grand Est, France.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, may the churches in Marne, Grand Est, France honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 7,132 believers living in Marne, Grand Est, France.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Tinqueux
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Tinqueux, Grand Est, France.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Marne, Grand Est, France. Please, stir the 7,132 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, please raise up prophets in Marne who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Marne, Grand Est, France has a population of 580,400.

We estimate Marne has 7,132 people who might know Jesus, 354,926 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 218,342 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Marne, Grand Est, France know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
